title: 106_s1372
content:
The Act titled "Proliferation Prevention Enhancement Act of 1999" mandates the use of the Automated Export System for filing certain shippers' export declarations. The Act "Proliferation Prevention Enhancement Act of 1999" authorizes the Secretary to require Shippers' Export Declarations to be filed electronically through an automated system established by the Department of the Treasury within 90 days of enactment. Regulations will be published to enforce this requirement. The Act "Proliferation Prevention Enhancement Act of 1999" authorizes the Secretary to require Shippers' Export Declarations to be filed electronically through an automated system. Regulations will include provisions for online assistance services, printing validated records, and a requirement from the Department of Commerce. The Act authorizes electronic filing of Shippers' Export Declarations through an automated system. The Department of Commerce must maintain a paper copy of submissions. The effective date is 180 days after certification of a secure Internet-based system. The Act encourages exporters to use the Automated Export System for filing Shippers' Export Declarations. Congress recommends voluntary participation in the system. The Secretary of Commerce, in coordination with other agencies, must report to Congress on the feasibility of mandating electronic filing through the Automated Export System for all Shippers' Export Declarations and how the data can be used by other automated licensing systems. The Secretary of Commerce, in coordination with other agencies, must report to Congress on the feasibility of mandating electronic filing through the Automated Export System for all Shippers' Export Declarations and propose a timetable for expanding information required to be filed through the system, including systems such as the Foreign Disclosure and Technology Information System, Proliferation Information Network System, Enforcement Communication System, and Export Control System. SEC. 5. DEFINITIONS.

Automated Export System: automated and electronic system for filing export information established under chapter 9 of title 13, United States Code.
Commerce Control List: list defined in section 774.1 of title 15, Code of Federal Regulations.
Shippers' Export Declaration: export information filed under chapter 9 of title 13, United States Code.
United States Munitions List: list of items controlled under section 38 of the Arms Export Control Act.
